description.en:
Gameologyv2 is a decentralized gaming ecosystem based on the binance smart chain.
The G-PLATFORM will be the native platform of Gameologyv2, where users will be able to register, access the arenas where they will find GMYX branded games, enter lobbies and fight against opponents to win GMYX prizes.
The G-APP, G-SHOP, G-NFT MARKETPLACE, will be linked directly to the platform. In the G-APP, users can keep their GMYXs, send or receive them, they can switch from the G-SHOP to the G-NFT MARKETPLACE in a few steps. The G-SHOP will allow users to purchase hardware and services through GMYX. In the G-NFT MARKETPLACE, users will be able to buy or win NFT cards related to GMYX games and use them in their fights. They will also be able to create and sell their own products, with payments always in GMYX.
